text: becoming a celebrity on social media is
not rocket science it's much more
complicated than that
ground control to Major Tom
Chris Hadfield is known worldwide but
it's not solely because he was the first
Canadian to walk in space he became a
youtube sensation after making this
music video in the International Space
Station but he didn't come up with this
all on his own there was a carefully
devised strategy around how he went
viral my son Evan was very pivotal and
the social media all I did was tweet and
send pictures to the ground and then
heaven took that it's spread it through
all of the other social media sites and
interacted with people and and called
people in the Canadian Space Agency's
really forward thinking about social
media they set up their own YouTube page
we made almost a hundred videos together
with the Canadian Space Agency all about
living and working and wringing out
cloths and brushing my teeth and
everything in space but it's not just
about tweeting into the dark from space
I got feedback from the kids all the
time of they don't do that don't put
happy faces in every time and never use
the phrase check out for more about this
and other trending stories check out our
